advancements.zenith.affix.desc: Find an item with a Zenith Affix.
advancements.zenith.altar.desc: Create an Altar of the Seas, which can turn unwanted enchanted items into a new book.
advancements.zenith.ancient_gem.desc: Using the Gem Cutting Table, create a Perfect Gemstone.
advancements.zenith.boss.desc: Slay a Zenith Boss, and retrieve their affix item.
advancements.zenith.capturing.desc: Get a spawn egg from a mob using the Capturing enchantment
advancements.zenith.chests.desc: Find an affix item in a chest.
advancements.zenith.conditions.desc: Disable spawn conditions for a spawner
advancements.zenith.enchanting_stats.des: Enchant an item while having at least 10 of each stat.
advancements.zenith.enchantment.desc: Obtain an enchanting table, and begin to unveil the mystery.
advancements.zenith.endshelf.desc: Acquire Infused Dragon's Breath, and create an Endshelf.
advancements.zenith.gem.desc: Find a Zenith Gem, which can be socketed into Affix Items.
advancements.zenith.gem_cut.desc: Use the Gem Cutting Table to upgrade a Zenith Gem.
advancements.zenith.infuse_hellshelf.des: Obtain an Infused Hellshelf through Infusion Enchanting.
advancements.zenith.infuse_seashelf.desc: Obtain an Infused Seashelf through Infusion Enchanting.
advancements.zenith.level20.desc: Obtain an item with an enchantment at level XX or higher
advancements.zenith.light.desc: Make your spawner work in any light level.
advancements.zenith.max_rectified.desc: Enchant an item with max stats and max rectification.
advancements.zenith.max_stable.desc: Enchant an item while having max Eterna and Arcana, but 0% Quanta.
advancements.zenith.max_stats.desc: Enchant an item while having all stats at maximum.
advancements.zenith.maxdelay.desc: Decrease the maximum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.zenith.merchant.desc: Purchase an affix item from the wandering trader.
advancements.zenith.mindelay.desc: Decrease the minimum spawn delay of a spawner to 20
advancements.zenith.modifier.desc: Use a spawner modifier to change the stats of a spawner.
advancements.zenith.nearbyents.desc: Raise the max nearby entities of a spawner to 32
advancements.zenith.noai.desc: Disable Mob AI for a spawner.
advancements.zenith.playerrange.desc: Raise the player activation range of a spawner to 48
advancements.zenith.players.desc: Disable the need for nearby players for a spawner
advancements.zenith.random.desc: Retrieve an affix item from a random monster.
advancements.zenith.redstone.desc: Enable redstone control for a spawner
advancements.zenith.sculkshelf.desc: Create a Sculkshelf using a Warden Tendril.
advancements.zenith.sharp10.desc: Enchant a weapon with Sharpness X or higher
advancements.zenith.socket.desc: Using a Smithing Table, socket a Gem into an item.
advancements.zenith.spawncount: Look at the Size of His Spawner!
advancements.zenith.spawncount.desc: Raise the spawn count of a spawner to 16
advancements.zenith.spawner.desc: Collect a mob spawner using Silk Touch.
advancements.zenith.spawner.root.desc: Spawners can be collected and modified, see JEI for info.
advancements.zenith.spawnrange.desc: Raise the spawn range of a spawner to 32
advancements.zenith.splitting.desc: Successfully drop an anvil enchanted with Splitting on an enchanted book to split it apart
advancements.zenith.ultimate_spawner.des: Create a spawner with minimal delays that has redstone control, no AI, ignores spawn conditions, and ignores players.
advancements.zenith.upgrade_endshelf.des: Upgrade an Endshelf into a Draconic Endshelf.
affix.zenith:breaker\/special\/enlighten: This tool can place a torch at the cost of %s durability.
affix.zenith:breaker\/special\/omnetic.d: This tool has %s effectiveness against all blocks.
affix.zenith:breaker\/special\/radial.de: This tool breaks in a %sx%s area.
affix.zenith:durable.desc: This item ignores %s%% of durability damage.
affix.zenith:heavy_weapon\/special\/clea: Attacks have a %s%% chance to also hit up to %s nearby enemies.
affix.zenith:heavy_weapon\/special\/exec: Enemies below %s%% max health will be executed.
affix.zenith:ranged\/special\/spectral.d: You have a %s%% chance to shoot a second arrow.
affix.zenith:shield\/special\/catalyzing: Blocking an explosion will grant you great strength.
affix.zenith:shield\/special\/psychic.de: Blocking a projectile deals %s%% of the damage to the shooter.
affix.zenith:shield\/special\/retreating: You will leap back when blocking in melee.
affix.zenith:sword\/special\/festive.des: Slain enemies have a %s%% chance to be a Loot PiÃ±ata
affix.zenith:sword\/special\/thunderstru: Your attacks deal %s damage to nearby enemies.
affix.zenith:telepathic.desc.tool: Block drops will teleport to you.
affix.zenith:telepathic.desc.weapon: Mob drops will teleport to you.
block.zenith.augmenting_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Enhancement to augment individual affixes
block.zenith.gem_cutting_table.desc: Uses Gem Dust and Rarity Materials to upgrade Gems
block.zenith.reforging_table.desc: Uses Sigils of Rebirth and Rarity Materials to reforge items
block.zenith.salvaging_table.desc: Breaks down Affix Items into Rarity Materials
bonus.zenith:bloody_arrow.desc: When firing, you lose %s%% Max Health and deal %s%% damage. %s
bonus.zenith:leech_block.desc: Blocking an attack heals you for %s%% of the damage. %s
bonus.zenith:mageslayer.desc: Ignore %s%% of magic damage and heal for the same amount.
bonus.zenith:twilight_fortification.desc: Taking damage has a %s%% chance to fortify you with Twilight Shields. %s
bonus.zenith:twilight_ore_magnet.desc: Can be used as an Ore Magnet, costing an extra %s durability.
bonus.zenith:twilight_treasure_goblin.de: Attacking an entity has a %s%% chance to summon a Treasure Goblin. %s
book.zenith.landing: Welcome to the world of Zenith, the $(l)unofficial$() Apotheosis port.$(br2)Zenith is organized into $(#8080FF)Modules$(), and so is the content of this book.$(br2)Disabled modules are hidden.
book.zenith.name: Chronicle of Shadows (Zenith Guide Book)
book.zenith.subtitle: Guide to Zenith
death.attack.zenith:corrupted: %s was drained by a corrupted enchantment.
enchantment.zenith.capturing.desc: Makes mobs have a chance to drop their spawn egg.
enchantment.zenith.chromatic.desc: Sheared wool will be changed to a random color.
enchantment.zenith.crescendo.desc: Your crossbow may be fired additional times per reload.
enchantment.zenith.earths_boon.desc: Ores may be found when mining stone.
enchantment.zenith.exploitation.desc: Wool received is doubled, but the sheep takes damage.
enchantment.zenith.growth_serum.desc: Sheep have a 50% chance to instantly regrow their wool.
enchantment.zenith.knowledge.desc: Enemy drops are directly converted to experience.
enchantment.zenith.life_mending.desc: Consumes received healing to repair items.
enchantment.zenith.miners_fervor.desc: You will mine very fast, but never instantly.
enchantment.zenith.natures_blessing.desc: Hoes may be used to bonemeal crops.
enchantment.zenith.obliteration.desc: Allows anvils to split single enchantments from books they fall upon.
enchantment.zenith.rebounding.desc: Melee attackers may find themselves much further away.
enchantment.zenith.reflective.desc: Blocked attacks may harm the attacker.
enchantment.zenith.scavenger.desc: Mobs killed may roll their loot tables twice.
enchantment.zenith.spearfishing.desc: Kills with a thrown trident may catch a fish.
enchantment.zenith.splitting.desc: Allows anvils to split multiple enchantments from books they fall upon.
enchantment.zenith.stable_footing.desc: Negates the mining speed penalty for flying.
gem.zenith:overworld\/royalty.bonus.pick: Breaking Iron Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Raw Gold instead.
gui.zenith.enchant.arcana.desc3: and increases the number of enchantments
info.zenith.altar:
The Altar of the Sea is a focus for conversion of enchanted items.

To begin, place one enchanted item on each pillar. Once all items are provided, the altar will drain experience from nearby players.
If experience cannot be drained, white particles will spawn.

Once complete, all items are consumed, and an enchanted book is generated.  Treasure enchantments can be obtained.
info.zenith.capturing: The capturing enchantment gives monsters a chance to drop their spawn egg.\n \nDrop Rate: 0.4%% per level
info.zenith.cobweb: Can be used to remove enchantments.
info.zenith.enchanting: Enchanting tables can now exceed 30 levels.  Some enchantments may only show up past level 30.
info.zenith.ender_lead: The Ender Lead is an item that can be used to move animals around.  Punch an animal to capture, and right click to release it.  The leash will not work on other types of entities.
info.zenith.ender_lead_left_click: Punch an animal to capture, and right click to release it. The leash will not work on other types of entities.
info.zenith.extraction_tome: Extracts all of the enchantments from an item.
info.zenith.filtering_shelf: Insert enchanted books to prevent them from appearing in the table.
info.zenith.filtering_shelf2: Gains eterna and arcana based on the number of inserted books.
info.zenith.gem_crushing: Gem Dust is obtained by dropping any Zenith Gem the in world, and making an Anvil block fall onto it.
info.zenith.gem_expulsion:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Zenith Gems.

The gems will be destroyed in the process.
info.zenith.gem_extraction:
Used in a Smithing Table to unsocket Zenith Gems.

The item will be destroyed in the process.
info.zenith.improved_scrap_tome: Extracts all of the enchantments from an item.
info.zenith.improved_scrap_tome2: Destroys the item in the process.
info.zenith.library: The enchantment library is a block that stores enchantments.  Inserting an enchanted book will deposit it.  Left-clicking on a stored enchantment will extract one level of it.  Shift-clicking will extract the max level available.
info.zenith.mining_arrow.diamond: Breaks blocks like a diamond pickaxe
info.zenith.mining_arrow.iron: Breaks blocks like an iron pickaxe
info.zenith.prismatic_cobweb: Can be used to remove curses.
info.zenith.salvaging: Rarity Materials are obtained by salvaging Affix Items in a Salvaging Table.
info.zenith.scrap_tome: Extracts half of the enchantments from an item.
info.zenith.scrap_tome2: Destroys the item in the process.
info.zenith.socketing:
Gems can be socketed with a Smithing Table. Item on the left, gem on the right.

Choose wisely, as removing a socketed gem is costly.
info.zenith.spawner: Spawners can be collected with %s and may be modified with various items.
info.zenith.spawner.always_drop: Spawners may be modified with various items, and will always drop when broken.
info.zenith.spawner.no_silk: Spawners may be modified with various items, but collection with Silk Touch is currently disabled.
info.zenith.tome_error: Bugged Item - Right click in the air to turn into an enchanted book.
info.zenith.unnaming: Used in a Smithing Table to remove the affix components from an item's name.
item.zenith.gem.zenith:the_nether\/blood: Gem of the Ravenous Blood Lord
item.zenith.potion_charm.crafting_disabl: Crafting of this charm is disabled!
item.zenith.potion_charm.desc: Applies %s when active and in the inventory.
item.zenith.potion_charm.trinkets_only: Only works in a Trinkets slot
item.zenith.sigil_of_enhancement.desc: Used to fuel the Augmentation Table
item.zenith.sigil_of_rebirth.desc: Used to fuel the Reforging Table
item.zenith.sigil_of_socketing.desc: Adds one socket to an item
item.zenith.sigil_of_unnaming.desc: Removes the affixed name from an item
item.zenith.sigil_of_withdrawal.desc: Removes all socketed gems from an item
misc.zenith.banned: Cannot be used on a Spawner
misc.zenith.max_value: This modifier cannot increase this above %s
misc.zenith.min_value: This modifier cannot reduce this below %s
stat.zenith.baby.desc: The spawner will always spawn a baby entity when possible
stat.zenith.ignore_players.desc: The spawner does not need a nearby player
stat.zenith.max_delay.desc: The maximum number of ticks between spawns
stat.zenith.max_nearby_entities.desc: The total number of entities allowed nearby
stat.zenith.min_delay.desc: The minimum number of ticks between spawns
stat.zenith.no_ai.desc: Spawned entities will have no AI
stat.zenith.redstone_control.desc: The spawner requires redstone to activate
stat.zenith.req_player_range.desc: How far a player can be before spawning stops
stat.zenith.silent.desc: Spawned entities will make no noise
stat.zenith.spawn_count.desc: The number of entities spawned at once
stat.zenith.spawn_range.desc: The radius (in blocks) that mobs can spawn in
zenith.easy_anvils: Easy Anvils is not compatible with Zenith's anvil additions. Anvil enchantments will not work!
zenith.easy_magic: Easy Magic is not compatible with Zenith's enchanting table additions. Zenith enchanting will not work!
